infos.value: ...They just keep coming. We should withdraw for the time being.
I can keep going.
I didn't make the suggestion out of concern for your wellbeing.
If we continue on like this, the casualties to our allies will only worsen.
Very well. Then withdraw Hourne's forces.
N-nonsense! You wish to make Leonis's last stand here!?
Would that not be in Hourne's favor?
H-how dare you!
Lord Mont... I beg your understanding!
We of Hourne have no desire to withdraw, either.
But alas, our odds of victory dwindle away as I speak before you...
But the odds aren't null.
Still your blathering tongue!
Darling!
Lord Mont... What do you mean to tell us?
Pay him no heed, Frederika. We have no chance of victory here!
If we could only break through the castle gates...
Even so...a fair number of Fennes soldiers surely lie in wait within the castle.
If we just rush in headfirst, would we not be playing straight into their hands?
He's right. Though with a bit of luck, we might be able to storm the castle.
It will work. Because...I have Mach√©rie with me.
...Good gods. What an unreasonable prince you are.
And what of us Hourne soldiers?
In just a moment...
A section of the gate will be broken. And once it is...!
Very well.
I shall play along with the willful prince for just a bit longer.
...They're coming!
